name: Not So Lonely (alpinus4, Fiszu)
description:
Even robots can feel lonely at times.

Left-click to move, right-click to change magnetic field type (sticking, repulsive).

Stick friends, repulse asteroids. As easy as that.

What about winning? Well, life's not about winning, life's about finding friends. Have fun!

Credits

Programmers: Mateusz Grzonka Filip szweda

Graphics Designer: Tymoteusz Szweda

Music Designer: Mateusz Środka
